laboratory_examinations.findings: Diffuse hyperostosis with thickened calvaria, measuring up to 3.8 cm in some areas. All foramina were significantly narrowed and occlusion of the shunt catheter was observed. Significant increase in the size of the frontal horns of the lateral ventricles compared with his last CT scan.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: There was a significant increase in the size of the frontal horns of the lateral ventricles over a few months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: The opening pressure during the procedure was more than 40 cm H2O. After shunt revision, an opening pressure of 45 cm H2O was measured.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Opening pressure increased from more than 40 cm H2O to 45 cm H2O after revision.
